text: head down,look down,lower head,lower your head
who=Chris,when=.5,do=say:Welcome teacher, we're glad that you're here today.+act:interrupt

who=Farrah,when=6,do=say:Before we get started let's take a couple deep breaths together. Breathe in through your nose, hold your breath, now breathe out. Go ahead and take another breath. Breathing helps us relax and learn from our practice.+act:interrupt
who=Luis,when=20,do=say:Okay, now, drag your mouse to walk around our classroom.+act:interrupt

who=Jazmin,when=35,do=say:Teacher, Do you like to read fiction or nonfiction? Click on the pencil icon on the toolbar to write on our blackboard. Circle the one you you most like to read.+act:interrupt+slide:0Draw
who=Jazmin,when=50,do=say:When you're done, click on the pencil in the toolbar to close the blackboard.

who=Jazmin,when=60,do=say: Call on us by name and ask us the question on the board Tell us about what you like to read. Press your spacebar to talk to us.+act:interrupt+slide:0Question1+slide:1Question2
who=Chris,when=135,do=say:It's time for us to go to our next class, but before we go, click on the graph in the toolbar to see what we did today+act:interrupt
who=Luis,when=165,do=say:Now, you can use what you learned about our reading habits to plan future lessons for us.
who=Chris,when=172,do=say:Click on the notebook in the toolbar to download more teaching resources
who=Farrah,when=185,do=say:You can continue to talk with us, if you'd like+act:sit
who=Jazmin,when=178,do=say:We look forward to your teaching us again!
